languages.text: {n}Старик прикрывает глаза, и его тело покачивается в такт шелесту листьев и звону ручья.{/n} "Этот слуга сновидений, кошмаров и дремы зрит то, что не в силах увидеть другие. Зрит былое и еще не случившееся. Ваше появление в сердце леса и..." {n}, — жрец медлит, -{/n} "последствия, что несет оно для Кетца Темера".

traits.locale_text: {n}Старик прикрывает глаза, и его тело покачивается в такт шелесту листьев и звону ручья.{/n} "Этот слуга сновидений, кошмаров и дремы зрит то, что не в силах увидеть другие. Зрит былое и еще не случившееся. Ваше появление в сердце леса и..." {n}, — жрец медлит, -{/n} "последствия, что несет оно для Кетца-аль Хета".

languages.text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."
languages.original_text: {n}Старик прикрывает глаза, и его тело покачивается в такт шелесту листьев и звону ручья.{/n} "Этот слуга сновидений, кошмаров и дремы зрит то, что не в силах увидеть другие. Зрит былое и еще не случившееся. Ваше появление в сердце леса и..." {n}, — жрец медлит, -{/n} "последствия, что несет оно для Кетца Темера".

traits.locale_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body starts swaying in tact with the rustle of the leaves and the murmur of the stream.{/n} "This servant of the dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. Can see what had transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}, — the priest hesitates, -{/n} "the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

Can see what had transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}, — the priest hesitates, -{/n} "the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

Can see what had transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}, — the priest hesitates, -{/n} "the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

languages.text: {n}El anciano cierra los ojos, y su cuerpo se mece al compás del susurro de las hojas y el murmullo del arroyo.{/n} «Este siervo de los sueños, las pesadillas y la duermevela puede ver cosas que otros no. Lo que sucedió y lo que aún está por suceder. Tu aparición en el corazón del bosque y...». {n}El sacerdote titubea momentáneamente.{/n} «Las consecuencias que tendrá para Quetza Temer».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}El anciano cierra los ojos, y su cuerpo se mece al compás del susurro de las hojas y el sonido del arroyo.{/n} «Este siervo de los sueños, las pesadillas y la duermevela puede ver cosas que otros no. Puede ver lo que sucedió y lo que aún está por suceder. Tu aparición en el corazón del bosque y...»{n}, aquí el sacerdote vacila, {/n}«las consecuencias que tendrá para Quetza Temer».

languages.text: {n}老人闭上眼睛，身体随着树叶的沙沙声与溪流的声音摇摆着。{/n}“此仆人能通过梦境、噩梦和幻象，看到别人看不到的东西，无论是已经发生的事情，还是将要发生的东西。此仆人看到您出现在森林中心的景象，以及……”{n}祭司停顿片刻。{/n}“……格扎尔特默为此承受的后果。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人闭上眼睛，身体随着树叶的沙沙声与溪流的声音摇摆着。{/n}“此仆人能通过梦境、噩梦和幻象，看到别人看不到的东西，无论是已经发生的事情，还是将要发生的东西。您出现在森林中心，然后……”{n}祭司犹豫片刻。{/n}“为格扎尔特默带来了后果。”

languages.text: {n}Le vieillard ferme les yeux et son corps oscille au rythme du bruissement des feuilles et des clapotis du ruisseau.{/n} « Ce serviteur des rêves, des cauchemars et des visions voit ce que les autres ne peuvent voir, ce qui était et ce qui sera. Votre venue au cœur de la forêt et... {n}hésite-t-il l'espace d'un instant,{/n} ses conséquences pour Quetza Temer. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vieil homme ferme les yeux et son corps oscille au rythme du bruissement des feuilles et des sons du ruisseau.{/n} « Ce serviteur des rêves, des cauchemars et des visions voit ce que les autres ne voient pas, ce qu'il s'est passé et ce qui adviendra. Votre venue au cœur de la forêt et... ses conséquences pour Quetza Temer, » {n}ajoute-t-il après un instant d'hésitation.{/n}

languages.text: {n}老人は目を閉じ、木の葉のざわめきと小川のせせらぎの音に体を揺らす。{/n}「この夢、悪夢、回想のしもべは、他の者には見えないものを見ることができる。何が起こったのか、そして何がまだ起こっていないのかを見ることができる。あなたが森の中心に現れたこと、そして…」{n}司祭は一瞬ためらい、言葉をつむぐ。{/n}「それが、ケツァ・テメルに及ぼす影響を」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人は目を閉じ、木の葉のざわめきと小川のせせらぎの音に体を揺らす。{/n}「この夢、悪夢、回想のしもべは、他の者には見えないものを見ることができる。何が起こったのか、そして何がまだ起こっていないのかを見ることができる。あなたが森の中心に現れたこと、そして…」{n}司祭は一瞬ためらい、言葉をつむぐ。{/n}「それが、ケツァ・テメルに及ぼす影響を」

languages.text: {n}Der alte Mann schließt die Augen, und sein Körper schwankt mit dem Rauschen der Blätter und dem Plätschern des Stroms.{/n} "Dieser Diener der Träume, Albträume und Tagträumereien kann Dinge sehen, die andere nicht sehen können. Was geschehen ist und was noch geschehen wird. Euer Erscheinen im Herzen des Waldes und", {n}der Priester zögert,{/n} "seine Konsequenzen für Quetza Temer".
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der alte Mann schließt die Augen, und sein Körper schwankt mit dem Rauschen der Blätter und dem Plätschern des Stroms.{/n} "Dieser Diener der Träume, Albträume und Tagträumereien kann Dinge sehen, die andere nicht sehen können. Er kann sehen, was geschehen ist und was noch geschehen wird. Euer Erscheinen im Herzen des Waldes und"{n}, der Priester zögert,{/n} "seine Konsequenzen für Quetza Temer".

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adam gözlerini kapatıyor. Bedeni, yaprakların hışırtısına ve akıntıların şırıltısına eşlik ediyor.{/n} "Rüyaların, kâbusların ve düşlemlerin bu hizmetkârı, diğerlerinin göremediği şeyleri görür. Vuku bulanları ve vuku bulacakları görür. Ormanın kalbinde ortaya çıkman ve..." {n}Rahip, bir anlığına sendeliyor.{/n} "Bunun Quetza Temer için doğuracağı sonuçları görür."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man closes his eyes, and his body sways to the rustling of the leaves and the babbling of the stream.{/n} "This servant of dreams, nightmares, and reveries can see things that others cannot see. What has transpired and what is yet to be. Your appearance in the heart of the forest and..." {n}The priest falters for a moment.{/n} "...the consequences it bears for Quetza Temer."
